name: Soapy Ball - Corona Blast
description:
It gets HARDER!!

This game is like WINE as it gets better with time but make sure to look for the turns as they are too many and are much closer than they look as the speed increases with time.

It's a game-cum-exercise for anyone who just want to relax and is too lazy to continue working.

It's a NON-LAZY game and I am sure you will not be lazy after playing the game.
